function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence of air supply diffuser performance on user position, angle, clothing insulation, and ambient air temperature.","Impact":"Reduced air quality for the user if these factors are not optimized.","Mitigation":"Utilize technology to monitor user position and clothing insulation, and adjust diffuser angle accordingly. Also, regulate ambient air temperature.","Technologies":"Smart sensors, automated diffuser adjustment, environmental control systems.","People":"Occupants of the built environment.","Owner":"Building management or facility maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Draught felt by people at high air flow rates from personalized air supply nozzles.","Impact":"Discomfort and dissatisfaction with the air supply system, potentially reducing its effectiveness.","Mitigation":"Use technology to adjust air flow rates dynamically based on user feedback and environmental conditions, and design nozzles to minimize draught effects.","Technologies":"Dynamic airflow control, user feedback sensors, nozzle design optimization.","People":"Occupants of the built environment.","Owner":"Building management or facility maintenance staff."}]}
